item.title: Trump’s hush money sentencing delayed over immunity ruling - The Washington Post
item.description:
1. Trump’s hush money sentencing delayed over immunity ruling  The Washington Post
  2. Judge delays Trump's hush money sentencing until at least September after high court immunity ruling  The Associated Press
  3. Greg Gutfeld: If defeating Trump is so vital, then why are Democrats running a ‘glazed donut’ against him?  Fox News
  4. The terrifying SEAL Team 6 scenario lurking in the Supreme Court's immunity ruling  POLITICO
  5. Trump's New York criminal sentencing delayed until September  NPR

item.title: Rage, sadness, frustration: Turmoil in the White House over Joe Biden
item.description: US President Joe Biden on Tuesday acknowledged his performance during last Thursday's presidential debate wasn't his best, but blamed it on jet lag after two overseas trips earlier in June. Biden has faced mounting questions about his 2024 reelection bid after last week's shaky debate performance, with one House of Representatives fellow Democrat on Tuesday publicly calling on him to withdraw from the race. Speaking at a campaign event in McLean, Virginia, on Tuesday evening, Biden admitted the debate against former President Donald Trump, his Republican rival, did not go well.

item.title: China seizes Taiwanese fishing boat, warns Taiwan not to interfere
item.description: Tensions rise as Chinese maritime enforcement persists near Kinmen following the deaths of two Chinese fishermen. President Lai Ching-te's term sees increased pressure from China, prompting Taiwan to seek communication for detained fishermen's release.
